About

Hi! I'm a undergraduate student in Electronics & Communication from JUIT. Recently I pursued Senior Certificate programme from University of Florida. This is my nest where I incubate my thoughts which I hope would someday hatch into something meaningful.

I have compiled some of my favourite quotes. Occasionally I like to dip my pen into poetry. Here are some of my poems.

I am a developer and a computer hobbyist. I am constantly trying to make stuffs. Some of the projects I have worked on are either a part of my academics, employment or a residue of my spare time.

Blog

As part of the planet, I feel inclined to share my opinion on everything that affects me both directly and indirectly. Most of my rambling revolves around world of tech, literature or anything that steals my attention. Feel free to drop a line.
